attributes.additional_details: I am making a petition to keep schools open and pubs closed because children’s futures should be put ahead of anyone’s drinking problems, i see alcoholics outside pubs during school times and i find it unfair that children’s education is being shortened and they aren’t learning as much as they should because people can’t stop themselves going to the pub.
attributes.background: i want the parliament to help keeps schools open, COVID-19 is restricting the children of a chance to get a future, and an education

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558050
